title: FS/FT: Joe Doyle N.Y. Hands above SGC 30
author: freakhappy

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Joe Doyle N.Y. Hands above SGC 30
posts.post_content:
Hello all,



Just upgraded this guy, so it's time to pass him on to another collector.  I purchased it within a few years ago from a great board member...I hate to move on from it, but I must!



The pics say it all, but a few details that will help along the way:



*There is a small spot of paper loss on the back, right beside the "S" in "Subjects"...it's a thin spot of paper loss and it's in a great spot, so it's tough to see and doesn't distract from the overall appeal.



*Zero creases and beautiful front



Asking $135 SALE PENDING



Every payment accepted, please contact me via PM or email (cavelyon@aol.com) with any questions...thanks for looking!
